better-snow-coverage.config.title: Better Snow Coverage
better-snow-coverage.config.excluded-blo: These blocks will (not) render a snow layer.
better-snow-coverage.config.excluded-tag: All blocks within these tags will (not) render a snow layer.
better-snow-coverage.config.max-vertical: Maximum vertical distance to check if snow is present.
better-snow-coverage.config.max-horizont: Maximum horizontal distance to check if snow is present.
better-snow-coverage.config.checker-mode:
Prefer Snow: Show snow if an equal amount of snow and air is present.
Prefer Air: Show air if an equal amount of snow and air is present.
All Sides: Only show snow if it is present on all sides.
Whitelist: Only show blocks with in the Lists
Blacklist: Don't render blocks with in the List
